name: Stratospheric Aerosol Injection
description:
Reduce the population using the aerosol spray from your plane. Tank refill pickups appear periodically. Avoid the projectiles shot by the radar towers.

  • Left / Right arrow keys to turn
  • Spacebar / Left mouse to spray

Suggested resolutions: 1920x1080 or 1280x720 (resolutions other than 16:9 may cause parts of the game world to be cut off)

Tools used
* Gimp 2.10.2 - Textures
* Unity 2018.2.18f1 - Game Engine
* Blender 2.79b - Modeling
* Audacity 2.1.3 - Sound Editing
* GarageBand 10.2.0 - Music Composition
* iPhone - Title Screen photo
* Mercurial 4.8 - Source code repository
